frontpage.your-tool: The survey tool for your event.
frontpage.benefit-3: Free of charge, clear, simple, fast.

benefit-5.title: You're planning a big event?
benefit-5.content-1: Contact our developer for detailed arrangements.

benefit-6.title: Donation
benefit-6.content-1: If you like feedb.ax, you can support the CJ and our developer with a contribution of your choice.

privacy.title: privacy
privacy.content: We are very pleased that you are using feedb.ax, powered by 365 STEPS. feedb.ax is a survey tool that was conceived and realized within the STEPS project of the Christliche Jugendpflege e. V. As a team, it is important to us that the protection and security of your personal data is maintained.
